name: Vectorinpup
short_description:
A cross between Vector/ Slackware Linux packages and Slacko Puppy Linux 5.2.97
Good on old and newer pc's
2.6.37.6 smp kernel.

Building block DIY style like AnitaOS.

News Flash Revised iso now gnomemplayer fully working inbuilt and now has deadbeef inbuilt instead of xmms so no extra downloads to make these work. Menu entry maker now part of install to edit menu.

Added Geany from Vector Linux as a text editor.
here to edit icons and config files: 
http://sourceforge.net/projects/vectorinpup/files/geany-0.19.1-i586-1vl70.pet/download


Wiki: https://sourceforge.net/p/vectorinpup/wiki/browse_pages/

Install Guide: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xxVOH3mo3Gw

Important Bash Update: http://sourceforge.net/projects/vectorinpup/files/Security/bash-4.1.14-2.pet/download
